short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds a trail of randomly colored stars that quickly fall and fade away

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a cool/pretty looking trail of randomly colored stars that quickly fall and fade away.

You can enable/disable the extension by clicking on the icon and it will remember your choice on the next restarts of the browser as well.

NOTE: You might have to restart the browser once to make the extension work initially.
